entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 12:41 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: E 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
